casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Patrick MYLETT 6A19-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. May 17, 2019 W. Rob Heroy, Attorney at Law, Charlotte, for Mylett, Patrick. Matthew W. Sawchak, Solicitor General, Ryan Y. Park, Deputy Solicitor General, James W. Doggett, Deputy Solicitor General, Robert S. Banks, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina. Noell P. Tin, Attorney at Law, Charlotte, for Pennsylvania Center for the First Amendment.

The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief filed on the 16th of May 2019 by Defendant:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 17th of May 2019."

Defendant shall have up to and including the 3rd day of June 2019 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court.
